row.name: PCK.AUTOMIC_AZURE.PRV.PROMPTSET.CREATE_DEPLOYMENT
row.description: Create deployment in Azure from XML

row.xui: <dialog height="424" icon="PRPT" id="PRPTS" left="0" top="0" width="441"><readpanel fill="b" id="PRPTBOX" nl="1" scroll="v" text="Provide information to create deployment in Azure "><properties><entry name="text">Provide information to create deployment in Azure </entry><entry name="modifiable">0</entry></properties></readpanel></dialog>

row.name: UC4RB_AZR_CLOUD_SERVICE#

<text alt="1" enabled="1" fill="b" focus="0" id="UC4RB_AZR_CLOUD_SERVICEs.00" inputassistance="0" len="" multiline="0" multilineIcon="0" nl="1" regex="" required="0" separator=";" showaspassword="0" text="Cloud Service Name" tooltip="Specify Cloud Service name in which you want to create a deployment" upper="0"><oninputassistant><command request="_internal" target="_view" targetaction="setAttribute" targetparam="promptname|@id"/><command request="_internal" target="_view" targetaction="setAttribute" targetparam="promptvalue|@value"/><command owner="_promptsetcontainer" owneraction="getData" request="getpromptinputassistance" target="_chainwindow"/></oninputassistant>
